original_text: They would spend the night stationed around the house of God, because they had to guard it; and they had charge of the key for opening it each morning.
korean_text: 그들은 하나님의 성전을 맡은 직분이 있으므로 성전 주위에서 밤을 지내며 아침마다 문을 여는 책임이 그들에게 있었더라

sentences.original_text: They would spend the night stationed around the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님의 집 주위에 머물며 밤을 보냈고

sentences.original_text: because they had to guard it
and they had charge of the key

sentences.korean_translation: 매일 아침에 그것을 여는 책임을 맡았다
